articles.title: Tech capital Bengaluru launches four apps to tackle water crisis - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Karnataka deputy CM DK Shivakumar said Bengaluru is facing a rainfall deficit, with 6,900 out of 13,900 bore wells having dried up.
articles.content:
Bangalore Water Supply and Sewerage Board (BWSSB) on March 14 launched four mobile-responsive web applications on March 13 to tackle the water crisis in the city.
